title: Why is LoL taking so long to download?

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
It's taking forever and keeps going up I just tested my internet 57.68 mbps Download and 11.51 mbps upload, Here's the specs: https://gyazo.com/b7d5d9ec15c5deb8ceb128d158af1abb

When down from about 5000 kbps to an average of 250 kbps for a little then drops down to 180 and stays there

Oh and I upgraded my client at an average of 2800-3000 kbps

replies.body:
The patching process can take a while, depending on how many files are corrupt/missing that the patcher has to grab, as well as your disk speeds, how full the disk is, the age of the disk, and network congestion. I recommend just letting it run for a while and come back to it.

If you have any other questions, let me know!
i have jsut reseted my pc and it says that it will take 3000mins and my net are fine so please fix this problem
Honestly whenever I've had to redownload league this happens to me once every 3 redownloads, currently redownloading and happened again lmao
